name: ChronoRacer
description:
This is a prototype made for Kenney Jam 2018.

Complete the circuit in the least possible time!

A / D: Steering.

W / S: Boost Up / Down.  You travel at a fairly constant speed and can regulate it a bit, but careful, your boost reserve is limited.

SPACE: Rewind time. Got into trouble? Just go back in time to a more comfortable position. The time you spend doing this counts towards your lap time, though.

Left / Right Arrow: Let time for the rest of the world go Backwards/Forwards. You stay in your position and let the world progress or regress in time around you. Useful for negotiating obstacles. The time you spend doing this doesn't count toward your lap time, but your time reserve for this is limited.
